did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Collection of scripts written by students in Prof. Louis E. Catron's theater classes at the College of William and Mary.
did.origination: Catron, Louis E.College of William and Mary. Dept. of Theatre, Speech, and Dance arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Manuscripts and Rare Books Librarian, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Louis E. Catron Papers, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from Louis E. Catron on 00/00/2001.

odd.head: Other Information
odd.p: A PDF document of this inventory is available online.
Additional information may be found at http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/findingaids/2001_5_Catron.pdf

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Louis E. Catron was a professor of Theatre and Speech at William and Mary from 1966-2002 and Director of the William and Mary Theatre. He holds a Ph.D. from Southern Illinois University, and is the author of several plays and books on playwriting.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of scripts written by students in Prof. Louis E. Catron's theater classes at the College of William and Mary.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Mss. Acc. 2001.50 Louis E. Catron Papers.
